989537641807908868.text:
1/ Ethereum launched >2.5 years ago and in that time has developed:

- smart contract best practices and libraries
- development tooling (truffle, dapp, remix)
- end user interfaces (metamask, toshi)
- a wealth of tutorials and documentation
